meanings.definition: A two-wheeled horse-drawn carriage with a driver's seat above and behind the passengers.
meanings.sent1: The hansom rattled down the cobblestone street.
meanings.sent2: I hailed a hansom to take me to the theater.
meanings.sent3: The hansom driver told a funny joke to his passengers.
meanings.sent4: The hansom was a time machine to the Victorian era.
meanings.sent5: The elegant hansom carried the couple through the bustling city.

meanings.definition: A type of taxi or cab with a driver's seat above and behind the passengers.
meanings.sent1: The bright yellow hansom pulled up to the curb.
meanings.sent2: I prefer taking a hansom when it's raining.
meanings.sent3: The hansom driver sang along to the radio, entertaining his passengers.
meanings.sent4: The hansom became a symbol of nostalgia in the modern city.
meanings.sent5: The sleek hansom weaved through traffic with ease.
